job.title: Software Engineer--Full Stack
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Computer & Network Security
job.description: Imagine a world dedicated to Security Without Compromise Synack headquartered in Silicon Valley with regional offices around the world protects leading global organizations by reducing companies security risk and increasing their resistance to cyber attack How do we do this By utilizing the worlds best and most trusted team of ethical hackers who test through our powerful and controlled platform to deliver real security without compromise At Synack we arent afraid to think outside the box or take on big challenges Backed by toptier venture capital firms including Kleiner Perkins Caufield ampamp Byers Microsoft and Google Ventures Synacks mission is to leverage global security talent coupled with advanced technology to help enterprises discover security vulnerabilities before they become business problems Discover the possibilities at SynackltbrgtltbrgtThis remote role is a unique opportunity to help build platforms that will revolutionize cyber security As a Full Stack Engineer you will have no shortage of interesting and challenging projects to work on You love to learn are excited about cybersecurity and want to be part of our fastpaced collaborative team making an immediate impact by building scalable web applications Sounds interesting Keep readingltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtHeres What Youll DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBuild a cutting edge enterpriseready web platform with an APIfirst approach that is used by security researchers from all over the worldltligtltligtBuild scalable and highly performant applicationsltligtltligtWork within a outcomeled team to understand the high level vision of the requirements and implement a delightful user experience for the researchers and customersltligtltligtDevelop software on our stack that is primarily written in Ruby on Rails and JavascriptltligtltligtDemonstrate leadership qualities with willingness to mentor peers and drive product developmentltligtltligtCommunicate effectively to the team and participate in design and code reviewsltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtHeres What Youll NeedltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtBS degree in CS or equivalent experienceltligtltligt3 years designing and building dynamic production solutionsltligtltligt3 years in Python Ruby on Rails PHP or JavaGo knowledge is a plus but you can learn it hereltligtltligt1 years using ReactJSRedux or other JavaScript frameworks and libraryltligtltligtAdept with various database systems such as MySQL PostgreSQLltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtReady to join usltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtSynack is committed to embracing diversity Our people are our strength Each addition to our team is an opportunity to grow and diversify our ideas experiences and
